title: Main Window Overview
content:
## The Main Window

After setup, the main window has 5 key areas:

### 1. Top Toolbar

**Left side:**
- âš™ï¸ **Settings** icon - Open settings (Ctrl+,)
- ðŸŒ **Language toggle** - Switch EN/HE
- â“ **Help** icon - Access help (F1)

**Right side:**
- Standard Windows controls (Minimize, Maximize, Close)

### 2. Status Panel (Left)

Shows current projector state:
- **Projector Name** - Bold at top
- **Connection Status** - Green/Red/Yellow indicator
- **Power State** - On/Off/Warming/Cooling
- **Input Source** - Current active input
- **Last Update** - Time since status refresh

### 3. Control Buttons (Center)

Quick access to operations:
- **Power On** (green) / **Power Off** (red)
- **Input Source** (blue dropdown)
- **Blank Screen** (yellow)
- Plus any optional buttons you enabled

### 4. History Panel (Right)

Operation log showing:
- Timestamp of each operation
- Operation type with icon
- Success âœ“ or Failed âœ— status
- Scrollable list of recent operations

### 5. Status Bar (Bottom)

**Left:** Connection stability indicator
**Center:** Operations count today
**Right:** Application version

## Window Behavior

**Minimize:** Hides to system tray (app keeps running)
**Maximize:** Expands to full screen
**Close:** Closes window (app continues in tray if configured)

## Keyboard Shortcuts

- `Ctrl+,` - Open Settings
- `F1` - Help Panel
- `Ctrl+Q` - Quit completely
- `Alt+F4` - Close window

> **Tip:** All 5 areas update in real-time as you control the projector!
